sectioninfo.titleabbrev: Investments in Financial Instruments When Valuations Are Based on Cost
sectioninfo.title: Investments in Financial Instruments When Valuations Are Based on Cost

section.para:
Procedures to obtain evidence about the valuation of financial instruments that are recorded at cost may include inspection of documentation of the purchase price, confirmation with the issuer or holder, and testing discount or premium amortization either by recomputation or through the use of analytical procedures.
